trans-unit.source: Path to the Python interpreter to be used for module execution on remote targets, or an automatic discovery mode. Supported discovery modes are auto, auto_silent, and auto_legacy (the default). All discovery modes employ a lookup table to use the included system Python (on distributions known to include one), falling back to a fixed ordered list of well-known Python interpreter locations if a platform-specific default is not available. The fallback behavior will issue a warning that the interpreter should be set explicitly (since interpreters installed later may change which one is used). This warning behavior can be disabled by setting auto_silent. The default value of auto_legacy provides all the same behavior, but for backwards-compatibility with older Ansible releases that always defaulted to /usr/bin/python, will use that interpreter if present (and issue a warning that the default behavior will change to that of auto in a future Ansible release.
trans-unit.target: Python解释器的路径，用于在远程目标或自动发现模式下执行模块。支持的发现模式是 auto ， auto_silent 和 auto_legacy （默认设置）。所有发现模式都使用查找表来使用随附的系统Python（在已知包含的发行版上），如果特定于平台的默认值不可用，则会退回到已知Python解释器位置的固定顺序列表。后备行为将发出警告，指出应明确设置解释器（因为以后安装的解释器可能会更改使用的解释器）。可以通过设置 auto_silent 禁用此警告行为。 auto_legacy 的默认值提供了所有相同的行为，但是为了与始终默认为 /usr/bin/python 的较旧Ansible版本向后兼容，将使用该解释器（如果存在的话）（并发出警告，表示默认行为将在将来更改为 auto 的行为）Ansible版本。

trans-unit.source: Path used for local ansible facts (*.fact) - files in this dir will be run (if executable) and their results be added to ansible_local facts. If a file is not executable it is read instead. File/results format can be JSON or INI-format. The default fact_path can be specified in ansible.cfg for when setup is automatically called as part of gather_facts. NOTE - For windows clients, the results will be added to a variable named after the local file (without extension suffix), rather than ansible_local.
trans-unit.target: 用于本地ansible事实（ *.fact ）的路径-此目录中的文件将运行（如果可执行），并将其结果添加到 ansible_local 事实中。如果文件不是可执行文件，则改为读取。文件/结果格式可以是JSON或INI格式。可以在 ansible.cfg 中指定默认的 fact_path ，以在安装程序自动作为 gather_facts 一部分调用时使用。注意-对于Windows客户端，结果将添加到以本地文件命名的变量（不带扩展名后缀），而不是 ansible_local 。

trans-unit.source: Path, from the source root, to a file whose contents is used for the template. Either a filename or build template must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 从源根到文件的路径,其内容用于模板。必须提供文件名或构建模板。

trans-unit.source: Paths are compared in a case-insensitive fashion, and trailing backslashes are ignored for comparison purposes. However, note that trailing backslashes in YAML require quotes.
trans-unit.target: 路径的比较是不区分大小写的,为了比较的目的,后面的反斜线会被忽略。但是,请注意,YAML中的反斜线是需要引号的。

trans-unit.source: Paths are evaluated in the order the paths are specified.
trans-unit.target: 路径按照指定的路径顺序进行评估。

trans-unit.source: Paths must be absolute and cannot conflict with other volume paths on the same build step or with certain reserved volume paths.
trans-unit.target: 路径必须是绝对的,不能与同一构建步骤上的其他卷路径或某些保留的卷路径冲突。

trans-unit.source: Paths to format definition files to process for each session.
trans-unit.target: 要为每个会话处理的格式定义文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Paths to search on the remote machine for the shutdown command.
trans-unit.target: 在远程计算机上搜索 shutdown 命令的路径。

trans-unit.source: Paths to type definition files to process for each session.
trans-unit.target: 要为每个会话处理的类型定义文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Paths will be read from the target host's filesystem, not the host running ansible.
trans-unit.target: 路径将从目标主机的文件系统中读取,而非运行ansible的主机。

trans-unit.source: Pay attention - it reassigns all objects owned by this role(s) in the db!

trans-unit.source: Pay attention that for real change some parameters restart of PostgreSQL server is required.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果要真正改变一些参数,需要重新启动PostgreSQL服务器。

trans-unit.source: Pay attention, change setting with ‘postmaster’ context can return changed is true when actually nothing changes because the same value may be presented in several different form, for example, 1024MB, 1GB, etc. However in pg_settings system view it can be defined like 131072 number of 8kB pages. The final check of the parameter value cannot compare it because the server was not restarted and the value in pg_settings is not updated yet.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，实际上没有任何更改时，具有“ postmaster”上下文的更改设置可以返回更改为true，因为相同的值可能以几种不同的形式表示，例如1024MB，1GB等。但是在pg_settings系统视图中，可以将其定义为131072 8kB页数。参数值的最终检查无法将其进行比较，因为服务器尚未重新启动并且pg_settings中的值尚未更新。

trans-unit.source: Pay attention, for embedded types when type=typeschema can be pg_catalog or information_schema respectively.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于type = type模式可以分别为 pg_catalog 或 information_schema 的嵌入式类型。

trans-unit.source: Pay attention, if concurrent=no, the table will be locked (ACCESS EXCLUSIVE) during the building process. For more information about the lock levels see https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/explicit-locking.html.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果parallel == no，则在构建过程中该表将被锁定（ACCESS EXCLUSIVE）。有关锁定级别的更多信息，请参见https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/explicit-locking.html。

trans-unit.source: Pay attention, the module does not support check mode! All queries will be executed in autocommit mode.
trans-unit.target: 注意,该模块不支持检查模式! 所有的查询都将在自动提交模式下执行。

trans-unit.source: Persistent disks are durable storage devices that function similarly to the physical disks in a desktop or a server. Compute Engine manages the hardware behind these devices to ensure data redundancy and optimize performance for you. Persistent disks are available as either standard hard disk drives (HDD) or solid-state drives (SSD).
trans-unit.target: 持久性磁盘是一种耐用的存储设备,其功能类似于桌面或服务器中的物理磁盘。Compute Engine 管理这些设备背后的硬件,以确保数据冗余并为您优化性能。持久性磁盘可以是标准硬盘驱动器(HDD)或固态驱动器(SSD)。

trans-unit.source: Persistent disks are located independently from your virtual machine instances, so you can detach or move persistent disks to keep your data even after you delete your instances. Persistent disk performance scales automatically with size, so you can resize your existing persistent disks or add more persistent disks to an instance to meet your performance and storage space requirements.
trans-unit.target: 持久性磁盘独立于您的虚拟机实例,因此您可以分离或移动持久性磁盘,以保留您的数据,即使您删除您的实例。持久性磁盘的性能会随着磁盘的大小而自动调整,因此您可以调整现有持久性磁盘的大小,或向实例中添加更多的持久性磁盘,以满足您的性能和存储空间需求。

trans-unit.source: Persistent disks must always use SCSI and the request will fail if you attempt to attach a persistent disk in any other format than SCSI.
trans-unit.target: 持久性硬盘必须始终使用SCSI,如果你试图以SCSI以外的任何其他格式附加持久性硬盘,请求将失败。

trans-unit.source: Pipe lookup internally invokes Popen with shell=True (this is required and intentional). This type of invocation is considered as security issue if appropriate care is not taken to sanitize any user provided or variable input. It is strongly recommended to pass user input or variable input via quote filter before using with pipe lookup. See example section for this. Read more about this Bandit B602 docs

trans-unit.source: Pipelining reduces the number of SSH operations required to execute a module on the remote server, by executing many Ansible modules without actual file transfer.
trans-unit.target: 管道化减少了在远程服务器上执行模块所需的SSH操作数量,通过执行许多Ansible模块而不需要实际的文件传输。

trans-unit.source: Pipelining, if supported by the connection plugin, reduces the number of network operations required to execute a module on the remote server, by executing many Ansible modules without actual file transfer. This can result in a very significant performance improvement when enabled. However this conflicts with privilege escalation (become). For example, when using ‘sudo:’ operations you must first disable ‘requiretty’ in /etc/sudoers on all managed hosts, which is why it is disabled by default. This option is disabled if ANSIBLE_KEEP_REMOTE_FILES is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Pipelining, if supported by the connection plugin, reduces the number of network operations required to execute a module on the remote server, by executing many Ansible modules without actual file transfer. This can result in a very significant performance improvement when enabled. However this conflicts with privilege escalation (become). For example, when using ‘sudo:’ operations you must first disable ‘requiretty’ in /etc/sudoers on all managed hosts, which is why it is disabled by default. This option is disabled if ANSIBLE_KEEP_REMOTE_FILES is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Pipelining, if supported by the connection plugin, reduces the number of network operations required to execute a module on the remote server, by executing many Ansible modules without actual file transfer. For example, when using ‘sudo:’ operations you must first disable ‘requiretty’ in /etc/sudoers on all managed hosts, which is why it is disabled by default. This options is disabled if ANSIBLE_KEEP_REMOTE_FILES is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接插件支持管道传输，则通过执行许多Ansible模块而不进行实际的文件传输，可以减少执行远程服务器上的模块所需的网络操作数量。启用后，可以显着提高性能。但是，这与特权升级（成为）冲突。例如，使用'sudo：'操作时，必须首先在所有托管主机上的/ etc / sudoers中禁用'requiretty'，这就是为什么默认情况下禁用它的原因。如果启用了 ANSIBLE_KEEP_REMOTE_FILES ,则禁用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Play recap now counts ignored and rescued tasks as well as ok, changed, unreachable, failed and skipped tasks, thanks to two additional stat counters in the default callback plugin. Tasks that fail and have ignore_errors: yes set are listed as ignored. Tasks that fail and then execute a rescue section are listed as rescued. Note that rescued tasks are no longer counted as failed as in Ansible 2.7 (and earlier).
trans-unit.target: 现在，由于在 default 回调插件中增加了两个统计计数器，因此播放重播现在可以计算已 ignored 和已 rescued 任务以及 ok ， changed ， unreachable ， failed 和 skipped 任务。失败并设置了 ignore_errors: yes 任务被列为被 ignored 。失败然后执行救援部分的任务被列为已 rescued 。请注意，与Ansible 2.7（及更早版本）相比，已 rescued 任务不再被视为 failed 。

trans-unit.source: Playbooks
trans-unit.target: Playbooks

trans-unit.source: Playbooks are Ansible’s configuration, deployment, and orchestration language. They can describe a policy you want your remote systems to enforce, or a set of steps in a general IT process.
trans-unit.target: 剧本是Ansible的配置，部署和编排语言。它们可以描述您希望远程系统执行的策略，或一般IT流程中的一组步骤。

trans-unit.source: Playbooks are a completely different way to use ansible than in ad-hoc task execution mode, and are particularly powerful.
trans-unit.target: Playbook是一种与ad-hoc任务执行模式完全不同的使用ansible的方式,而且功能特别强大。

trans-unit.source: Playbooks are designed to be human-readable and are developed in a basic text language. There are multiple ways to organize playbooks and the files they include, and we’ll offer up some suggestions on that and making the most out of Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 剧本被设计为人类可读的并且以基本文本语言开发。有多种方法来组织剧本及其包含的文件，我们将就此提供一些建议，并充分利用Ansible。

trans-unit.source: Playbooks are expressed in YAML format (see YAML Syntax) and have a minimum of syntax, which intentionally tries to not be a programming language or script, but rather a model of a configuration or a process.
trans-unit.target: 剧本以YAML格式表示（请参阅YAML语法），并且具有最少的语法，这有意尝试不是一种编程语言或脚本，而是一种配置或过程的模型。

trans-unit.source: Playbooks are expressed in YAML format with a minimum of syntax. If you are not familiar with YAML, look at our overview of YAML Syntax and consider installing an add-on for your text editor (see Other Tools And Programs) to help you write clean YAML syntax in your playbooks.
trans-unit.target: Playbooks are expressed in YAML format with a minimum of syntax. If you are not familiar with YAML, look at our overview of YAML Syntax and consider installing an add-on for your text editor (see Other Tools And Programs) to help you write clean YAML syntax in your playbooks.

trans-unit.source: Playbooks can also be executed interactively with --step:
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用 --step 交互式执行剧本：

trans-unit.source: Playbooks can contain multiple plays. You may have a playbook that targets first the web servers, and then the database servers. For example:
trans-unit.target: 游戏本可以包含多个游戏。你可能有一个剧本,首先针对web服务器,然后是数据库服务器。例如:

trans-unit.source: Playbooks can declare configurations, but they can also orchestrate steps of any manual ordered process, even as different steps must bounce back and forth between sets of machines in particular orders. They can launch tasks synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Playbook可以声明配置,但它们也可以协调任何手动有序流程的步骤,甚至不同的步骤必须以特定的顺序在一组机器之间来回跳转。它们可以同步或异步地启动任务。

trans-unit.source: Playbooks can:
trans-unit.target: 游戏本可以。

trans-unit.source: Playbooks record and execute Ansible’s configuration, deployment, and orchestration functions. They can describe a policy you want your remote systems to enforce, or a set of steps in a general IT process.
trans-unit.target: Playbooks record and execute Ansible’s configuration, deployment, and orchestration functions. They can describe a policy you want your remote systems to enforce, or a set of steps in a general IT process.

trans-unit.source: Playbooks should still use connection: local.
trans-unit.target: 剧本仍应使用 connection: local 。

trans-unit.source: Playbooks using privilege escalation should always use “become*” options rather than the old su*/sudo* options.
trans-unit.target: 使用特权提升的剧本应该始终使用“ become *”选项，而不是旧的su * / sudo *选项。

trans-unit.source: Please note that all templating happens on the Ansible controller before the task is sent and executed on the target machine. This is done to minimize the requirements on the target (jinja2 is only required on the controller) and to be able to pass the minimal information needed for the task, so the target machine does not need a copy of all the data that the controller has access to.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,所有的模板化都是在Ansible控制器上进行的,然后才在目标机器上发送和执行任务。这样做是为了最大限度地减少对目标机的要求(控制器上只需要jinja2),并且能够传递任务所需的最小信息,因此目标机不需要控制器所能访问的所有数据的副本。

If you rely on specific IP addresses etc., use the community.general.docker_container module to ensure your containers are correctly connected to this network.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,该模块只确保这些容器连接到网络,但不关心连接选项。如果你依赖于特定的IP地址等,请使用community.general.docker_container模块来确保你的容器正确连接到这个网络。

trans-unit.source: Please note that the module regenerates existing CSR if it doesn’t match the module’s options, or if it seems to be corrupt. If you are concerned that this could overwrite your existing CSR, consider using the backup option.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果模块不匹配模块的选项，或者看起来已损坏，则模块会重新生成现有的CSR。如果您担心这可能会覆盖现有的CSR，请考虑使用备份选项。

trans-unit.source: Please note that the module regenerates existing DH params if they don’t match the module’s options. If you are concerned that this could overwrite your existing DH params, consider using the backup option.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果现有的DH参数与模块的选项不匹配，则模块将重新生成它们。如果您担心这可能会覆盖现有的DH参数，请考虑使用备份选项。

trans-unit.source: Please note that the module regenerates existing certificate if it doesn’t match the module’s options, or if it seems to be corrupt. If you are concerned that this could overwrite your existing certificate, consider using the backup option.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果模块不匹配该模块的选项，或者该模块似乎已损坏，则该模块将重新生成现有证书。如果您担心这可能会覆盖现有证书，请考虑使用备份选项。

trans-unit.source: Please note that the module regenerates private keys if they don’t match the module’s options. In particular, if you provide another passphrase (or specify none), change the keysize, etc., the private key will be regenerated. If you are concerned that this could overwrite your private key, consider using the backup option.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果私钥与模块的选项不匹配，则模块将重新生成私钥。特别是，如果您提供另一个密码短语（或不指定密码短语），更改密钥大小等，则将重新生成私钥。如果您担心这可能会覆盖您的私钥，请考虑使用备份选项。

trans-unit.source: Poll mode is smart so all jobs will be started before polling begins on any machine. Be sure to use a high enough --forks value if you want to get all of your jobs started very quickly. After the time limit (in seconds) runs out (-B), the process on the remote nodes will be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Poll mode is smart so all jobs will be started before polling begins on any machine. Be sure to use a high enough --forks value if you want to get all of your jobs started very quickly. After the time limit (in seconds) runs out ( -B ), the process on the remote nodes will be terminated.

trans-unit.source: Poll mode is smart so all jobs will be started before polling will begin on any machine. Be sure to use a high enough --forks value if you want to get all of your jobs started very quickly. After the time limit (in seconds) runs out (-B), the process on the remote nodes will be terminated.
